Lancer_Shot.display_help: You charge up your Beam Rifle and deliver an incredibly focused ray of energy that deals Superior Energy damage and will briefly stun the target. Lancer Shot will cause additional damage if the target is suffering from Disintegrate. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Lancer_Shot.display_short_help: Ranged, Superior DMG(Energy), Foe Stun, Special
Lancer_Shot.display_target_help: You have disoriented by the Lancer Shot's impact.
